about.text2: I am David Samuel Suarez Montoya, Founder of Veltron Dynamics and Chief Technology Officer (CTO) and co-founder of ARCADIUS-NIC. Passionate about technology, innovation, and software development, I dedicate my career to designing and leading technical solutions that add real and sustainable value.
about.text3: With over 5 years of experience in the sector, I have been responsible for the architecture and implementation of scalable, robust systems aligned with business strategic objectives.
about.text4: I specialize in transforming complex ideas into functional digital products, always focusing on quality, security, and continuous improvement. My mission is to connect the potential of technology with the growth of people and organizations.

projects.title: Projects
projects.card1Content: We created a Web App for room reservations with a Dashboard for managing reservations and staff.
projects.card2Content: System that allows carrying out portfolio and personnel control at the time of disbursing the credits applied to microfinance institutions.
projects.card3Content: Main site of the Arcadius website
